title: Charity Vote Refund?
body: So, I just logged in and checked the new "Voting for charity" tab and the client (like always) glitched out, and i couldnt see what the votes were for.So, i chose one, but nothing happened and now it counted as a vote. Any way to get my vote back? I dont even know what the options were.

replies.body:
I'm not seeing that info being tracked on the tools I have on my end, so I'm not sure right now which one you picked. Most likely, we won't be able to reverse that vote, but it's not the best choice to have blindly picked knowing you might not have wanted to choose that option. 

All in all, I should be able to tell which one you picked if you remember if it was the left, middle, or right one. Which one did you click on?
I chose the left one, but, at least it was not a bad vote. Ill just have to live with that. Thanks for the response
